Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Production date: 181 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes (2015) 142.)
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (51)
